name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a focused Senior Backend Engineer, I bring 8 years of experience in developing high-performance backend solutions, leveraging my expertise in **Kotlin**, **Ktor**, **Kafka**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Docker**. My capabilities encompass robust API design and event-driven architecture to ensure scalable and efficient systems. Additionally, I have a strong background in cloud services, particularly with **Google Cloud Platform**, enhancing application deployment and management. 
My original strengths lie in problem-solving and teamwork, where I have successfully led cross-functional teams to deliver enterprise-grade platforms in the healthcare and financial sectors. I am also experienced in integrating AI coding tools and implementing messaging patterns to enhance functionality and operational efficiency. Fluent in both **German** and **English**, I am known for my initiative and collaboration skills in fast-paced development environments.
